entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
